message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you at $200. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me there?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. While I understand your offer, $200 is my bottom line. It's a fantastic product at that price.  What would you say to meeting halfway at $160?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $160 is still a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to go up to $140. Can we meet somewhere in the middle of that and $160?
